PROFESSIONAL_EXPERIENCE.title: Front End Developer
accomplishments: Assisted with interface design & user experience design according to client needs
Independently built front-end of projects from prototype to production
Performed manual unit testing and end-to-end testing of web applications
Assisted integration & live testing with CodeIgniter back-end frameworks with senior programmer
Provided minor database administration using MySQL command line tools & GUI database managers
Maintained good version control practices with Git as well as Subversion for legacy projects
Provided technical troubleshooting for clients as well as help for colleagues as needed
Consistently improved and learned new skills with every project
Consulted & collaborated with clients on a regular basis to provide optimization suggestions and project progress updates
